author: Georgette M
title: Great location and hotel!
text:
I have no idea why this hotel is a two star hotel. It should be a 3 at least! The room is a bit small (to be expected in NYC) but there's everything you could need and it's very clean. The staff is very attentive. I took my niece for a quick getaway to see theater and was extremely happy with our choice of hotel. The best location we could have asked for!
What a good value!
Room Tip: If you want a view, ask! We just had a brick wall outside our window but we didn't mind at all. See more room tips
